import './App.css'; import FX from './logic/FXtaxes'; function App() { const FXconverter = new FX(); let selectToValues = []; function convert() { let amontToConvert = document.querySelector('#amountToconvert').value; let amountConverted = FXconverter.getRate('EURUSD', Number(amontToConvert)); console.log(amountConverted) document.querySelector('#amountConverted').value = amountConverted.convertAmount; } function clickFrom() { let selectFrom = document.querySelector('#selectFrom'); let selectTo = document.querySelector('#selectTo'); switch(selectFrom.value) { case 'EUR': selectToValues=["USD", "ARS", "BRL"]; break; case 'USD': break; case 'BRL': break; } } function clcikBuy () { } return (
